title: Luxury Golf & Travel
description: Frequent presidential golf trips (often to Trump properties), requiring Air Force One, Secret Service, and staff—padding his own pockets while taxpayers foot the bill.
fullDetails:
**Secret Service Spending**: The GAO found that the Secret Service spent approximately $396,000 on protective equipment and services for four trips the president took to Mar-a-Lago in 2017, working out to about $99,000 per trip.

**Travel Costs**: Air Force One costs approximately $142,380 per hour to operate. With flights to Mar-a-Lago taking about 4.5 hours, each round-trip costs taxpayers over $1.2 million in flight costs alone.

title: Military Parade Mania
description: Grandiose parade proposals inspired by France's Bastille Day—millions spent on planning before being canceled, with nothing to show but headlines and invoices.
fullDetails:
**Planning Costs**: Despite no parade materializing, millions were spent on preliminary planning and logistics.

**Congressional Criticism**: Senator Jack Reed called it "a waste of money and an unnecessary burden on our troops and military resources."

**Cancellation**: Eventually postponed and then quietly canceled amid ballooning cost estimates from the initial $12M to $92M.

title: Grant & Contract Cancellations
description: Abruptly axed grants and contracts (e.g., $50M environmental justice grant, $881M in education contracts), wasting funds already spent and leaving vital work unfinished.
